welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nova Gorica, Slovenia! Known for its charming blend of Italian and Slovenian culture, we invite you to explore our city and indulge in its rich history, delicious cuisine, and stunning landscapes. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Nova Gorica.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building at Ronchi Dei Legionari Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Airfield Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portoroz Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Portoroz Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
